1.0.1.name: wordpress/mind-reader
1.0.1.description:
This plugin is just like a trick game, for find out symbol that is remember in your mind How to play this game

Think of a number with 2 digits (ex: 63) Subtract from this number its 2 digits (63 - 6 -3 = 54 ) Find the symbol that corresponds to this number Concentrate on the symbol and click on the blank square... your remember symbol will here.
